description: landscape in fall colors; two standing men in LLQ on yellow grasses; very tall, thin trees in middle ground in front of houses and blue church steeple; orange clouds; low horizon line
medium: Color soft-ground etching and aquatint on Japan paper
provenance: (Catherine E. Burns, Oakland, CA, until 2002; sold to Drake); Harry Drake, St. Paul (2002-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA).
signed: LRC below image, in pencil: J. Cotton
title: Landscape with Church Tower
